1938 FIFA World Cup squads

\t\t\t
\n\t\t\t\t
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
\t\t\t\t
\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\n\t\t\t\t\tJump to:\t\t\t\t\tnavigation, \t\t\t\t\tsearch\n\t\t\t\t
\n\t\t\t\t

Below are the squads for the 1938 FIFA World Cup final tournament in France.

\n

Hungary and Switzerland were the only teams who had players from foreign clubs. All the three such players represented French clubs.

\n

\n

\n

Head coach: Vittorio Pozzo

-4FWKlaas Ooms(1916-06-09)9 June 1916 (aged 21)0 DWB
-3MFBas Paauwe(1911-10-04)4 October 1911 (aged 26)21 SC Feyenoord Rotterdam
-3MFRene Pijpers(1917-09-15)15 September 1917 (aged 20)0 RFC Roermond
-2DFHendrikus Plenter(1913-06-23)23 June 1913 (aged 24)0 Be Quick 1887
-4FWPiet Punt(1909-02-06)6 February 1909 (aged 29)1 DFC Dordrecht
-4FWKick Smit(1911-11-03)3 November 1911 (aged 26)21 HFC Haarlem
-4FWFrans van der Veen(1918-03-25)25 March 1918 (aged 20)1 Heracles Almelo
-3MFPuck van Heel(1904-01-21)21 January 1904 (aged 34)62 SC Feyenoord Rotterdam
-1GKAdri van Male(1910-10-07)7 October 1910 (aged 27)9 SC Feyenoord Rotterdam
-4FWHenk van Spaandonck(1913-06-25)25 June 1913 (aged 24)7 Neptunus Rotterdam
-4FWLeen Vente(1911-05-14)14 May 1911 (aged 27)14 Neptunus Rotterdam
-2DFMauk Weber(1914-03-01)1 March 1914 (aged 24)25 ADO Den Haag
-4FWFrank Wels(1909-02-21)21 February 1909 (aged 29)35 Unitas Gorinchem
\n

Dutch East Indies[edit]

\n

Head coach: Johan Mastenbroek

\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n

-2DFJan Harting HBS Soerabaja

-4FWM.J. Hans Taihuttu19090 Jong Ambon Batavia
-4FWTan Hong Djien(1916-01-12)12 January 1916 (aged 22)3 Tiong Hoa Soerabaja
